item.title: Apache Hop 2.8 is available!!
item.description: After more than three months of work on 79 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.8.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.8 brings: Two new AWS transforms AWS SNS Notify AWS SQS Reader Various Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.
